Talking: ^Of course I am! What's on your mind?

c-0: ^How do you deal with 15 year olds?
c-1: ^You should swing by and watch our show sometime. We'd love to have a fellow musician be there.
c-2: ^Thanks for talking with me, but I should really get going.
^It's all good. Have a good day kiddo!

c-0: ^I'm just worried about working with them. We don't exactly have the best relationship with each other.
^Just give it some time and that'll change. Don't stress too much about it right now.

Invitation: ^Hmmm. My girlfriend has been wanting to go to more concerts...

c-0: ^Don't want to disappoint her then. We have another one coming up soon so you can come to that one!
^Deal. We could do with a new band in our list anyways.
c-1: ^You should definetly come see us play then. My siblings are super talented, I swear. We would love to have additional fans there to watch it.
^We'll see. I need to talk to her about it first.
